summary: This mod will add a new artefact named \"Ysmir\'s Fury\" to the world of Tamriel. But, can you find it?
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Clue2.png[/IMG][/center]

[size=\"3\"][color=\"#8B0000\"]Description[/color][/size]
===========
This mod will add a new artefact named \"Ysmir\'s Fury\" to the world of Tamriel. But, can you find it?
Hunt for this powerfull artefact and claim it for your own.

Hint:
[spoiler]
Rumor has it that there\'s a source of incredible power somewhere in Skyrim, though no man, woman or child on the face of Tamriel has ever found it.
Take a moment of rumination, and enter the halls that shield the artefact from man and Aedra.
[/spoiler]

Happy hunting =)

Facts:
- It\'s powerfull!
- It can be improved at the grindstone
- It cannot be crafted

[size=\"3\"][color=\"#8B0000\"]Known Issues or Bugs[/color][/size]
Possible [spoiler]
====================
Possible bug: Ysmir\'s Fury not in container
[/spoiler]

[size=\"3\"][color=\"#8B0000\"]History[/color][/size]
=======
v1 - initial release
v3 - Textures and nifs are now archived. no more separate files!
Also a first attempt to fix the weapon not showing up in the appropriate location.
v3.1 - removed BSA\'s, eliminating the cause of missing textures.
[spoiler]
Also placed a new chest that doesnt respawn. The issue of Ysmir\'s Fury not being in the chest should be solved!
[/spoiler]
v3.2 - The weapon has slightly shifted location. Same area, different resting place.
No more chest containing it.
v3.3 - fixed issue of not being able to pick up the weapon. (bad collision mesh)

[size=\"3\"][color=\"#8B0000\"]Contact[/color][/size]
=======
Right here on the Nexus.

[size=\"3\"][color=\"#8B0000\"]Licensing/Legal[/color][/size]
===============
The contents of this mod cannot be used under any circumstance. Uploading the original file on other sites is allow, when a link to this page is provided and the uploader has the author\'s permission to do so.
Credit should also be given to the original author.

===============
